description.en:
Fated out of necessity, he and she met.

BANG!

He is a desert. A vicious animal. Above all else, he is the noble but unrecognized successor to the Sultan. He has owned her for one year. And now he moves to own her for the rest of her life.

---
It was inevitable that they'd meet by chance. *Bam!* He's a desert, a violent beast, and the Sultan's heir, someone more important than everyone else and yet still acknowledged by nobody. He owns her for one year, but is trying to keep her forever.

“Friedrich Dürrenmatt once said, ‘It is only in love and murder that we still remain sincere.’ Since you’re still alive, does that mean I love you?” says the man that's done with playing hide and seek, Ashan.

"Oh my, that's a scary confession. There isn't anything in the contract about having to spend the night here though," says the woman trying to escape, Seoyoon.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/Dogjae_), [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/8463), [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8F%85%EC%9E%AC/2705), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=54224754), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8719896), [Peanutoon](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/8506), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/945066250)


**Official Translations:**

description.fr:
En rentrant chez elle après des années de guerre en Afghanistan, une militaire coréenne trouve sa famille complètement endettée. Sur les recommandations d'un ami, elle signe pour une mission d'un an qui lui permettra de décrocher le pactole, sans avoir dans quoi elle s'embarque. La voilà garde du corps d'un dangereux prince, héritier d'un sultan mourant... et cible de nombreux assassins. Tiendra-t-elle jusqu'au bout de son contrat?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/Dogjae_), [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/8463), [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8F%85%EC%9E%AC/2705), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=54224754), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8719896), [Peanutoon](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/8506), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/945066250)

description.ko:
우연이 만들어낸 필연 속에서 그와 그녀가 만났다. 탕! 그는 사막이다. 한 마리 사나운 짐승이다. 그리고 누구보다도 고귀하지만 누구에게도 인정받지 못한 술탄의 후계자. 그가 그녀의 1년을 소유했다. 그리고 이제 평생을 소유하려 한다.

“프리드리히 뒤렌마트가 말했지. 오직 사랑과 살인에만 우리의 진심이 남아 있다고. 너는 살아 있으니 나는 너를 사랑하는 건가?”

-숨바꼭질을 끝낸 남자, 아샨. “그것 참, 무시무시한 고백이네요. 하지만 계약서에 함께 밤을 보내란 이야기는 없었습니다.”

-도망치고 있는 여자, 서윤.

**웹툰 [독재]는 김신형작가의 원작소설 [독재]의 기본 설정을 토대로 재해석하여 새롭게 제작된 2차 창작물입니다.**

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/Dogjae_), [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/8463), [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8F%85%EC%9E%AC/2705), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=54224754), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8719896), [Peanutoon](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/8506), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/945066250)

description.uk:
Неминуче було, що вони зустрінуться випадково. Бам! Він?
Пустеля, жорстокий звір і спадкоємець султана, хтось важливіший за всіх,
але все ще ніким не визнаний. Він володіє нею протягом року, але намагається 
зберегти її назавжди.«Фрідріх Дюрренматт якось сказав: 
«Тільки в любові та вбивстві ми все ще залишаємося щирими». 
Оскільки ти ще живий, це означає, що я тебе люблю?» — каже чоловік, 
який закінчив грати в хованки.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/Dogjae_), [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/8463), [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8F%85%EC%9E%AC/2705), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=54224754), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8719896), [Peanutoon](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/8506), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/945066250)
